languages.text: Enemies affected by the Navigator's powers suffer a stacking −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the next {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} from the Navigator's powers. The penalty is lost after such a test is made.
languages.original_text: Противники, к которым применяются силы навигатора, получают суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 при следующей {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверке на сопротивление{/g} силам навигатора. После проведения проверки штраф снимается.

traits.locale_text: Enemies affected by the Navigator's abilities gain a stacking −10 penalty to the next resistance check from Navigator's powers. Penalty is lost after such check is made.
Enemies affected by the Navigator's abilities suffer a stacking −10 penalty to the next resistance test from the Navigator's powers. The penalty is lost after such a test is made.

Enemies affected by the Navigator's powers suffer a stacking −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the next {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} from the Navigator's powers. The penalty is lost after such a {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} is made.

Enemies affected by the Navigator's powers suffer a stacking −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the next {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} from the Navigator's powers. The penalty is lost after such a {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} is made.

languages.text: Противники, к которым применяются силы навигатора, получают суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 при следующей {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверке на сопротивление{/g} силам навигатора. После проведения проверки штраф снимается.
languages.original_text: Enemies affected by the Navigator's powers suffer a stacking −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the next {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} from the Navigator's powers. The penalty is lost after such a test is made.

traits.locale_text: Противники, к которым применяются способности навигатора, получают суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 при следующей проверке на сопротивление силам навигатора. После проведения проверки штраф снимается.

Противники, к которым применяются способности навигатора, получают суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 при следующей проверке на сопротивление силам навигатора. После проведения проверки штраф снимается.

languages.text: 每当导航者的能力对敌人造成影响时，该名敌人下次{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}都会额外承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。此效果在抗性检定结束后消失。
languages.original_text: Enemies affected by the Navigator's powers suffer a stacking −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the next {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} from the Navigator's powers. The penalty is lost after such a test is made.

traits.locale_text: 每当导航者的能力对敌人造成影响时，该名敌人下次{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}都会额外承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。此效果在抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}结束后消失。

languages.text: Los enemigos afectados por los poderes del Navegante sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} acumulativa de −10 en la próxima {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} que deban hacer para resistirse a los poderes del Navegante. Esta penalización desaparece tras efectuar una de dichas pruebas.
languages.original_text: Enemies affected by the Navigator's powers suffer a stacking −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the next {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} from the Navigator's powers. The penalty is lost after such a test is made.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos afectados por los poderes del Navegante sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} acumulativa de −10 en la próxima {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} que deban hacer para resistirse a los poderes del Navegante. Esta penalización desaparece tras efectuar una de dichas {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g}.

languages.text: Gegner, die von den Kräften des Navigators betroffen sind, erleiden einen kumulativen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 auf die nächste {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} durch die Kräfte des Navigators. Der Abzug wird nach einer erfolgreichen Probe aufgehoben.
languages.original_text: Enemies affected by the Navigator's powers suffer a stacking −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the next {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} from the Navigator's powers. The penalty is lost after such a test is made.

traits.locale_text: Gegner, die von den Fähigkeiten des Navigators betroffen sind, erleiden einen aufaddierbaren −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf die nächste {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} durch die Kräfte des Navigators. Der Abzug wird nach einer solchen {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} aufgehoben.

Gegner, die von den Kräften des Navigators betroffen sind, erleiden einen kumulativen {g|Encyclopedia:Abzug} von -10 auf die nächste {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest{/g}Widerstandsprobe{/g} durch die Kräfte des Navigators. Der Abzug wird nach einer erfolgreichen {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} aufgehoben.

languages.text: Les ennemis sous l'effet des pouvoirs du navigateur subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} cumulative de −10 lors du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à ces pouvoirs. La pénalité est annulée une fois le test passé.
languages.original_text: Enemies affected by the Navigator's powers suffer a stacking −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the next {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} from the Navigator's powers. The penalty is lost after such a test is made.

traits.locale_text: Les ennemis sous l'effet des pouvoirs du navigateur subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} cumulative de -10 lors du {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} suivant lié à ces pouvoirs. La pénalité est annulée une fois le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} passé.

languages.text: 航宙士の力を受けた敵は、航宙士の力への次の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に-10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}（累積可）を受ける。このペナルティは判定が行われると消失する。
languages.original_text: Enemies affected by the Navigator's powers suffer a stacking −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the next {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} from the Navigator's powers. The penalty is lost after such a test is made.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士の力を受けた敵は、航宙士の力への次の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に-10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}（累積可）を受ける。このペナルティは{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}が行われると消失する。

languages.text: Rotacı'nın güçlerinden etkilenen düşmanlar, Rotacı'nın güçlerinin tetiklediği bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} (üst üste birikebilir) alırlar. Böyle bir teste girildikten sonra ceza puanı ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: Enemies affected by the Navigator's powers suffer a stacking −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the next {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} from the Navigator's powers. The penalty is lost after such a test is made.
